name: Duplex Layout
description: An apartment with three floors can be referred to as a triplex.Strangely however, and rather confusingly, in the USA, a 'duplex' is a dwelling comprising two apartments with separate entrances, whether the apartments are side by side,or one above the other.

name: Financial Reporting
description: Financial reporting is a standard accounting practice that uses financial statements to disclose a company's financial information and performance over a particular period, usually on an annual or quarterly basis.

name: Best Quality
description: The Top Quality Apartment is a modern and pleasant apartment for 6 People, placed in Foz da Ria Resort. Being the apartment within Foz da Ria Resort the guests will have access to all the facilities: its swimming pool, gym, sauna, jacuzzi, tenis court and subtropical garden.

name: High-Level Security
description: The system maintains a highly detailed access and authorization scheme defining Access control and system action. Documents are compartmentalized in the “silent Access control” method, namely the user sees only what he is allowed to see.

name: Large Playground
description: From backyard playgrounds to kids' playsets, swing sets, slides and playhouses, we have the playground ... Shop our large selection of kids swing sets.Playground Outfitters offers a wide range of commercial playground.

name: Luxury Apartments
description: Penthouse Apartments: A penthouse apartment is a luxury apartment that is placed on the the top most floor of the building. These apartments have beautiful views of the skyline and the landscape.

name: Good Neighborhood
description: When Brad Whitman—local celebrity due to his HVAC commercials—moves his white, upper-class family to Oak Knell he sets off a chain of events that culminate in a tragedy. The Whitman family moves right next door to Valerie Aston-Holt and her son Xavier.

name: Property Management
description: Property management is the daily oversight of residential, commercial, or industrial real estate by a third-party contractor. Generally, property managers take responsibility for day-to-day repairs and ongoing maintenance, security, and upkeep of properties.

name: Good Natural
description: The more sunlight a building harnesses, the less electricity it has to use. ... You can save money and lessen your environmental impact by living in an apartment with abundant natural light.
